title: Textile, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller-printed in 5 colors on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 72.5 x 89 cm (28 9/16 x 35 1/16 in.)
Repeat L: 42.5 cm (16 3/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund
description: Two offset Gothic-style windows set one next to the other with a bishop standing in front of one. Glazed and polished.
